base: After two seconds of casting, the caster will send a wave of darkness toward the target area

The circle will pulse once per second for 3 seconds and then pulse seven times for 2 seconds
Enemies on circle will be dealt 10% HP per pulse
If Mad Clown is on circle, he will heal 2.5% max HP per pulse
On finish, if Mad Clown is not on circle, he will teleport to circle and face where he was
He will shoot three balls that deal 25% HP each toward where he was in a 30 degree arc
Lasts 5 seconds
Dispels all magic from the caster and creates two images that deal 20% Attack Damage and take 250% Damage
Lasts 40 seconds
Upon reaching half of his HP, Mad Clown will create a wheel that reaches 1000 range and can suck in anyone within 2000 range for 12 seconds
The wheel will have an inner and outer layer with 5 lines that move counter-clockwise
Every 3 seconds, lights will appear in either the inner or outer layer, if enemies are within that light after 1 second, they will be stunned for 10 seconds
On Auto-Attack, 20% chance to deal 1.75x Attack Damage
On death, grow in size for one second and deal 2500 Magic Damage to all nearby enemies

Summons 4 Frozen Souls after .5 seconds of channeling that last 90 seconds
On attack, applies debuff that rduces movement speed by 40% and attack speed by 20%

Deals 200 damage a second to all nearby enemies (1200 range)

When cast, creates a shield that can absorb 10% HP that can be broken that lasts 10 seconds
When destroyed, freezes all enemies in place for 1 second

Upon cast, pushes all enemies away. When a target is nearby, the caster will face toward that target for 3 seconds
before unleash a wave that will insta-kill all those in its path

On Auto-Attack, 15% chance to deal 2.5x Attack Damage

Chooses a target to spawn a firey infernal at location, dealing 4000 damage on impact
On cast, deals 2000 damage to surrounding enemies (400 range)
On third cast, channels spell for 3 seconds before dealing 75% HP to all enemies (1000 range) and stuns self for 5 seconds
On cast, summons a line going counter clockwise every 45 degree angle starting a 3-o-clock every second that kills all within its range
Gains .125 attack speed and 100 Attack Damage per Auto-Attack for 10 seconds
Deals 500 Magic Damage to all nearby enemies per second
On attack, give -5 armor debuff on enemy
Stacks 5 times
Heals a target for 12500 HP over 12 seconds
After choosing a target to follow, channels for 1.5 seconds sends a wave of green flames where Spirit Beast is facing

The flames last for 10 seconds dealing 450 Magic Damage per half second
Creates a clone to cast Etheral Strike to a random target
Will pull targets into Spirit Beast during Heaven's Wrath
Etheral Strike will not be affected by Heaven's Wrath
Spawns eight green orbs around caster that slowly travels towards the caster
When orbs reach caster, they heal 1% HP each and give 5 mana, if they blocked, they deal 500 Magic Damage
On reaching 50% HP, gain 25% damage reduction and changes spells
Etheral Strike now moves toward the target again when it reaches its length
Three thunder bolts now strike every second, dealing 1500 damage each and stunning enemies for 1 second
Dispels when healed to full
On Auto-Attack, 40% chance to deal 1.5x Attack Damage
On cast with .15 delay, chooses a random target to corrupt and deal 25% damage to all nearby enemies
On corruption, the enemy will spawn green circles every 2 seconds below which will deal a stackable 5% HP per second
Lasts for 20 seconds, circles remain on ground for 60 seconds
Chooses a target area that will explode for 20% HP and interrupt Players after a 2 second delay
At past 50% HP, after the initial blast, 8 coils will shoot out in diagonal and cardinal directions, dealing 1000 Magic Damage each and interrupting the first person they touch
Binds two target's souls to be swapped. When their orbs each the other Player, they will swap, insta-killing all nearby Players on their locations
Every 3 seconds second, Rectus will emit a blast of corruption that will deal increasing Magic Damage as the fight goes on
Decreases nearby Players armor by 25
At every 25% HP missing, Rectus will summon his minions
At 75%, he'll summon 1 Avenger, Rectus is invulnerable until Avenger is killed
At 50%, he'll summon 1 Avenger and 8 Stalkers, Rectus is invulnerable until Avenger is killed
At 25%, he'll summon 1 Avenger and 8 Stalkers, Rectus will become vulnerable after 10 seconds
After 1 second wind-up, creates a 150 degree arc in front of the Avenger that deals 2500 Magic Damage and adds a -150 armor debuff on target that lasts 10 seconds
On death, deals 10% HP Magic Damage to all nearby enemies. Heals Avenger for 10% if nearby
On death, heals Players 3000 HP per second for 15 seconds with a 20 second recharge
On 2nd death, deals 50% Magic Damage to nearby Players every 5 seconds
On Auto-Attack, 20% chance to deal 2x Attack Damage
Targets a random Player and fires dual meteors every half second target the target location
Each impact stuns all enemies nearby for .5 seconds and deals 5000 Magic Damage each
On every Auto-Attack, Flame Nightmare will drain all of his own mana
If he reaches full mana, whenever he gets stunned or silenced, he begins to push all Players away for 5 seconds and becomes immune to crowd control effects

Creates 8 lava spawns that walk toward the impact after spawning
Creates flame paths that deal 5% max HP Magic Damage per second that last 3 seconds
On collision with the impact zone, heal Flame Nightmare for 10% if its near

Become vulnerable after duration is over

Picks a nearby target to gaze at, marking them with a purple circle

Every second, sends a mana orb toward a random target
Deals 10% max HP Magic Damage to everyone nearby impact zone

Every second for four seconds, fire a fire ball at the nearest target
Each fireball deals 3000 Magic Damage on impact

Chooses a random target to create a spike under
After 4 seconds, locks that place down and after 1 second, creates a Hell Spike, instantly killing everyone in the area unless they're immune to instant kills
Every third Hell Spike, create an unstable spike that will kill everyone in the arena that isn't behind another Hell spike after three seconds have passed
After 2 seconds of wind-up, anyone staring at Bone Dragon will be paused and vulnerable for 10 seconds

This mode unlocks the Hell Spike ability forever, but locks Petrification until this mode is over
Lasts until mana is gone, which takes 20 seconds to fully deplete
Interrupts and pulls target toward caster
When stunned or silenced, gain 10 mana per second
At full mana, gain super armor, which gives the user crowd control immunity
Can still be stunned or silenced if spell is longer than 3 seconds
Drains the souls of nearby heroes, healing self for 10000 per nearby enemy
Pushes all enemies away
Decreases HP of affected (summons are not decreased) by 1200 until fight ends
Silences a target area and deals 10% max HP Magic Damage to those affected for 5 seconds
After 1 second of channeling, slashes the air, dealing 7500 Magic Damage to all those in the path
Reduces movement speed by those affected by 25%
After channeling for 2.25 seconds, summons a wave of devastation that instantly kills all underneath it
At every 25% HP reached, he will build up power for three seconds and devastate the area, killing everyone in the area
Only people who can survive insta-kill or invulnerable can survive
Gains 50% Damage Reduction for 2.5 seconds
On attack, gain 100% of Auto-Attack Damage back as HP
On Death, use all mana to come back to life
Immune to Crowd Control
Gets removed with Holy Water from the Church
At 100% mana, channel for 1 second and send a death coil to Zombie Lord
Heals him for 25% HP and 25% Mana
Death Coil instantly kills all those in path
Reduces movement speed by 50% and increases attack speed by 400%
Has 100% Damage reduction during this mode
Every attack also interrupts enemies
Every hit also regens 1 mana
Lasts for 5 seconds
Will only cast if HP is missing
On auto attack, gain 50% of damage back as HP
Auto attacks deal 100% damage to a small AoE
On auto attack, apply debuff that deals 375 Magic Damage per second
On every five stacks reduces healing by 20% until 100%
Lasts for 15 seconds
Infests 2 Zombies and 2 Players
Gives a debuff that will turn the target green and increase in size
Movement speed increases by 50%, does not break the cap
After 5 seconds, the target will explode, dealing 50% Magic Damage to all nearby enemies
Can be cleansed to remove the explosion
Creates 2 hexagonal pattern of warning lights
Those within the area after the flash will be instantly killed
Those outside the range will be dealt 0% max hp Magic Damage the first blast, and 50% max HP the next
Can be interrupted through a pause
When damage goes below 1 HP, if Zombie lord has full mana, he will ressurect
During the 3 second ressurection, he will deal 40% max HP pure damage per second to all enemies in the green light
He will automaticaly gain hunger after ressurection
His damage will increase by 25% every life past 4th life
His DR will increase logarithmically
His DR up to ninth life is as listed: 0, 25, 43.8, 57.8, 74.7, 84.8, 90.9, 94.5, 96.7
Create a ring of spikes at one of the 4 layers around Ancient Ent, each starting about 300 range more than the last
When an enemy is hit by these spikes after 1.5 seconds of wind-up, deal 12000 Magic Damage and stun enemies for 3 seconds
After 2.5 seconds of channeling, conjure a lightning storm that takes up a third of the arena vertically or a half horizontally
Positions are random
Deals 300% Max HP Magic Damage and breaks players shields
Deals 25% Max HP Magic Damage to those outside the storm
On Auto-Attack, 20% chance to deal 1.5x Attack Damage
At 50% HP, plants its roots down into the ground, gaining 66.7% Damge reduction and spawn 2 Elder Ents
Lasts until one of the Elder Ents are down
Also increases orb spawn rate by 50%
Can reset if Ancient Ent reaches 100% HP
After 1.5 second of wind-up, the ground in front of Elder Ent spikes up, dealing 7500 Magic Damage and stunning all those in the path for 1 second
Creates a breakable shield that returns 33% of damage dealt as pure damage to the attacker
Lasts 5 seconds
Heals all allies by 10% per second when within 200 range
When reaching 66% and 33% HP, gain 100% Damage reduction and select a random target in the arena
Elder Ent will then jump into the air and follow that target for 3 seconds, then it locks onto that place to land on
Anyone in the impact zone is instantly killed
Target the nearest Player to throw 7 waves of light at
Each wave deal 2000 Magic Damage and stuns all those in the path for .5 seconds
Waves come once per second
Create 7 circles of light around Samael in random locations
After .5 second of wind-up, circles will deal 6% max HP Magic Damage per .3 second and interrupt target for 2 seconds
On final tick, deal 31% Max HP Magic Damage
These circles will disappear when Samael uses Judgment or dies
Summon 12-18 orbs of light, dpeending on the amount of players, that will float towards Samael
Samael will heal 15000 HP per orb
If blocked by another unit, deal 1500 Magic Damage and reduces Healing by 50% for 4 seconds
Explodes on contact
Regenerate 1% HP per second and gain 25% Damage reduction
Can be broken
Cannot be cast above 85% max HP
When stunned or silenced, gain 10 mana per second
When full mana, become cc-immune and knockback all enemies for 5 seconds
Can still be stunned or silenced if spell is longer than 3 seconds
Breaks all player shields
Loses all mana when triggered
After reaching 33% and 66% HP, summons a platform of light around Samael
Players within the light will die after 1 second of wind-up
There are 6 rotations per set, lasting about 18 seconds
Each person dying to the wheel heals Samael by 20% max HP if there are less than 5 players, otherwise 20%-12% max HP from 6 players to 10
These can reset if Samael reaches 90% HP and 50% HP respectively
Deals 30% Max HP Magic Damage to all those in path after .5 second of wind-up
Slows down enemies by 50%, and prevents direct healing for 7 seconds

On hit, creates a breakable shield that converts 1000% of damage taken to health for 3 seconds
Allows Shadow Dragon and his Large Illusion to strike three enemies at once
After .25 seconds of wind-up, deals 4500 damage to all enemies nearby
Ignites one random Player, dealing 1000 Magic Damage per second to all nearby enemies
Increases Damage Reduction by 10% at first permamently
Every follow up proc increases damage reduction by roughly 1+(.9/times procced)x current reduction up to 100%
On death, sends a spirit of darkness to all enemies
After 5 seconds of channeling (timer resets on application), instantly kill all Players around target, if a dragon is near, heal that dragon by 50%
Whenever three Illusions and one Large Illusion are together, they will gain 100% Damage Reduction and 250% Attack Speed
Upon reaching 50%, regain full HP and summon 3 Illusions of Irbert and 1 Large Illusion of Irbert that appear on either side of Shadow Dragon
However, Shadow Dragon becomes invulnerable and paused until the minions are dead
Shadow Dragon also creates an aura that deals 1.5% Max HP Magic Damage per second that lasts the rest of the fight
Shadow Aura deals 50% more damage every 500 range away from him up to 2000 range
Creates a purple circle at a random target that silences anyone who's in the circle after 2 seconds it was created
Deals 25% max HP Magic Damage and silences all in the circle for 4 seconds
Selects a target, if that target is alone, it will die instantly
If there is a second enemy nearby, link the target and that enemy
While this link is up, reduce damage by 50%
Can be broken if the distance between enemy links is at least 1200 range
Selects a random target and charges up a blast for 1.75 seconds
Any enemy in the circle after the ball of darkness is launched is instantly killed
Grants user special effects from Death Fiend minions
Death Huntresses' Mark prioritizes that target for Domination Arrow
Death Weaver's Mark prioritizes that target for Teleportation
Death Devourer's mark prioritizes that target to be focused during Hungering Charge
hard: Grants user special effects from Death Fiend minions
Death Huntresses' Mark prioritizes that target for Domination Arrow
Death Weaver's Mark prioritizes that target for Teleportation and will instantly kill marked with Deadly Dance

base: Create two death coils that spiral around the target
On contact with any Player, applies debuff to those in area that lasts 5 seconds
When debuff is stacked twice, instantly kill person
On contact, deals 6000 Magic Damage
hard: Create two death coils that spiral around the target
On contact with any Player, applies debuff to those in area that lasts 5 seconds
Faster in Hard Mode
When debuff is stacked twice, instantly kill person
On contact, deals 11000 Magic Damage

base: Afer 2 seconds of casting, apply 'Impeding Doom' to 2 enemies that have attacked Death Fiend for 5 seconds
It deals 3000 magic damage every second until the debuff is over
hard: Afer 1 second of casting, apply 'Impeding Doom' to 2 enemies that have attacked Death Fiend for 5 seconds
It deals 3000 magic damage every second until the debuff is over
If not cleansed, will instantly kill those affected when timer is over

base: On Auto-Attack, create an orb of death that flies around Death Fiend

Stuns players for 3 seconds if they're in the attack
hard: On Auto-Attack, create an orb of death that flies around Death Fiend
On 7th attack and a 4 second wind up, destroy all orbs and deals 25000 Magic Damage that reaches 1000 range in a 150 degree arc in front of Death Fiend
Stuns players for 3 seconds if they're in the attack
Afterward, creates 3 pools of dark energy in front of Death Fiend that deals 2500 Magic Damage per .5 second that last for 18 seconds

base: At 80% and 60% HP, gain 90% Damage Reduction for 10 seconds
Summons one of three minions randomly at two set locations
Same minion cannot be summoned twice
Does not trigger if Determination of Death is triggered
At 20% HP, deal 200% max hp Magic Damage to everyone in the arena and heals back to full
Increases attack speed by 60%, becomes immune to CC effects
Disables Unholy Summoning

If Player is hit, instantly kill him
Can be dodged
When one of Death Fiend's minions or Death Fiend himself dies, give 4 second countdown
After 4 seconds, gain 100% Damage Reduction forever
This is a fail condition
Whenever this caster is near another user with this spell (800 range), gain 100% Damage Reduction
Targets a random Player to track with a purple beam within the arena with unlimited range
Deals 40% max HP + 4500 pure damage, breaks all shields, and applies a debuff that lasts 30 seconds and slows down target movement speed by 30%
If the target with the debuff is hit twice, they will be instantly killed
Every 3 attacks, weaken's the target soul by reducing healing taken by 5%, stacks until 100%
Creates a small vortex at location that will pull the Player
Vortexes can grow three times, after that it will grow no more
During the last 4 seconds, the vortex will grow more and more red until it explodes, instantly killing everyone being pulled
Vortexes last for 30 seconds, the timer resets when they grow

Every fourth arrow, these marks will ignite, dealing 999k damage and insantly killing everyone in range of the mark (200 range)
Each explosion spawns 4 Death Hounds
Drags target in front of you, after 1 second of windup, swipes 13 times in 3 seconds

hard: Drags target in front of you, after .5 seconds of windup, swipes 13 times in 3 seconds

base: After 1 second of wind-up, sends 8 waves around caster

hard: After .5 seconds of wind-up, sends 8 waves around caster
Each wave does 7500 Magic Damage and slows Player's movement speed by 50% for 5 seconds

base: When reaching max mana, choose a random target to teleport to and mark them with a skull above them
After 3 seconds, stun target (cc effect) for 3 seconds and automatically start casting either Sword Blows or Deadly Dance
Will teleport back to its original position afterward
Creates orbs around the arena that travel toward Death Devourer
On contact with enemy, deals 15% max HP Magic Damage
Each orb heals Death Devourer by 10%
Every enemy in the marked circle around Death Devourer will have their regen decrease by 5% max HP every second
Will also take .24*(x%/10)% Max HP Magic Damage every tick
Removed immediately after going out of the circle
After 3 seconds of interruptable wind-up, silences all enemies in arena
At full mana, choose a random target in arena to chase for 10 seconds
Will deal 90% Magic Damage to those in its path and run down trees
Once Death Devourer reaches its target it will instantly kill it
Once finished, Death Devourer will teleport back to its starting position
If Devourer hits the border, it stops but continues afterwards
hard: At full mana, choose a random target in arena to chase for 10 seconds
Will instantly kill all those in its path and run down trees
Once Death Devourer reaches its target it will instantly kill it
Once finished, Death Devourer will teleport back to its starting position
If Devourer hits the border, it stops but continues afterwards

base: On hit, apply a debuff that decreases the target's visibility
After 20 hits, instantly kill target
Lasts for 5 seconds, reapplies every application
Can be cleansed
Targets a random player and after 2 seconds, links them to the furthest target for 5 seconds
When these two players are far apart for 3 seconds, they will be pulled together (CC Effect), dealing 25% max HP magic damage to everyone at the collision point and stuns for 3 seconds
Once the players are near each other the timer will go down
Once the timer reaches zero, they will be released
If there are no players near Valtora, he will link the player to himself for 12 seconds, dealing (250 + 250*elapsed time) Pure Damage in melee range
hard: Targets a random player and after 2 seconds, links them to the furthest target for 10 seconds
When these two players are far apart for 3 seconds, they will be pulled together (CC Effect), dealing 50% max HP magic damage to everyone at the collision point and stuns for 3 seconds
Once the players are near each other the timer will go down
Once the timer reaches zero, they will be released
If there are no players near Valtora, he will link the player to himself for 12 seconds, dealing (250 + 250*elapsed time) Pure Damage in melee range

base: After calling out a random player in 1500 range, Valtora will wait 2 seconds before throwing a hammer
Does 25% max hp + 2500 Magic Damage and applies Nasty Shock for 5 seconds
After Rage of the Thunder God, hammers apply a lightning pool
This pool applies nasty shock for 1 second
If Valtora is in the lightning pool, he heas 10% HP per second
hard: After calling out a random player in 1500 range, Valtora will wait 2 seconds before throwing a hammer
Does 25% Max Hp + 2500 Magic Damage and applies Nasty Shock for 5 seconds
Hammers apply a lightning pool regardless of phase
This pool applies nasty shock for 1 second
If Valtora is in the lightning pool, he heas 10% HP per second

base: Summons two Servants of Lightning God
Cannot be cast if above 85% HP
hard: Summons two Servants of Lightning God
Cannot be cast if above 85% HP
Each Servant alive gives Valtora 8% Damage Reduction

base: Summons a red line that sweeps vertically or horizontally across the arena
Anyone in its path will instantly be killed and be dealt 1500 pure damage
Breaks through kill immunity and invulnerablity
Can be dodged with height
Cannot be cast before 50% HP is reached
Create four tornados that travel around four quadrants around Valtora
Once these tornados are on an enemy, applies 'Windy' debuff
Windy deals 6% Max HP Pure Damage per second
Tornados also increase height of enemies by 400, allowing them to dodge Wrath of Heaven
hard: Create four tornados that travel around four quadrants around Valtora
Once these tornados are on an enemy, applies 'Windy' debuff
Windy deals 10% Max HP Pure Damage per second
Tornados also increase height of enemies by 400, allowing them to dodge Wrath of Heaven
Tornados are also faster on Hard Mode

base: Sparks the atmosphere with electrically charged orbs
When orbs hit the player, deal 20% max hp Magic Damage and applies Nasty Shock for 3 seconds
hard: Sparks the atmosphere with electrically charged orbs
When orbs hit the player, deal 25% max hp Magic Damage and applies Nasty Shock

base: Deals 750 Magic Damage to player every second
Orbs also reduce healing by 75% and reduce damage done by target by 40%
hard: Deals 750 Magic Damage to player and 1500 Magic Damage to nearby allies every second
Reduces healing by 100% and reduces damage done by target by 40%

base: Becomes unselectable and flies up into the air, casts three Wrath of Heavens and then flies back down
Lasts for 30 seconds
Gain 30% Damage Reduction
Breakable shield that deals 500 Magic Damage per second to nearby enemies and grants 50% magic defense
Makes Auto-Attacks interrupt target
Disappears after 15 seconds
hard: Breakable shield that deals 750 Magic Damage per second to nearby enemies and grants 50% magic defense
Makes Auto-Attacks interrupt target

base: Deals 2.5% max HP Magic Damage to enemy
Bounces to nearby enemies 10 times
Does not lose damage on bounce
hard: Deals 5% max HP Magic Damage to enemy
Bounces to nearby enemies 10 times
Does not lose damage on bounce

base: Every strike deals 100% AoE damage and spawns 2 magmas around Ifrit
Magmas crawl toward Ifrit and on contact, heal him .5% HP
Random chance to proc an attack speed buff
Once proc, increase attack speed by 10% every hit until attack speed is 2/sec
Lasts for 5 seconds if not reapplied
Selects a target to explode with a 10 second countdown
On explosion, deal 50% max hp Magic Damage to all players WITHIN 750 range

After 50% HP, apply this to two targets
hard: Selects a target to explode with a 10 second countdown
On explosion, deal 50% max hp Magic Damage to ALL players
Can be cleansed
After 50% HP, apply this to two targets

base: When applied, reduces magic resistance by 75%
Lasts for 3 seconds
hard: When applied, reduces magic resistance by 100%
Lasts for 3 seconds

base: Sends down Meteors at random places around Ifrit
On Impact they'll deal 15000 Magic Damage and stun for 3 seconds
The waves will deal 6000 Magic Damage
After the impact, create a lava pool that lasts 10 seconds
Lava pools deal 10% max HP Magic Damage per second
hard: Sends down Meteors at random places around Ifrit

The waves will deal 7500 Magic Damage

base: Selects a random target to chase, after waiting 3 seconds, start moving toward that target
Kills all units on the floor in its path
If collide with debris, stop
Sends 2 lava pool waves behind self at a 'V' angle that deal 10000 Magic Damage
hard: Selects a random target to chase, after waiting 1 second, start moving toward that target
Kills all units on the floor in its path
If collide with debris, stop

Meteors will fall every 5 seconds
Create 5 lines that will move in either direction that will deal a ton of Magic Damage per second and stun anyone it its path

Spawns 2 Lava Spirits to the sides on the second wheel
Grants 10% damage reduction and 100 armor per stack
Can have up to 10 stacks, depending on players: (5 + 1 X (player count / 2))

After 1 second of wind-up, smacks the target away 300 range and stuns them for 2 second

Selects a random target to chase, after waiting 3 seconds, start moving toward that target
Kills all units on the floor in its path
If collide with debris, stop

Heals Duke for (1 + .1*Total Links)% HP per second

These people inside will receive no healing nor regen and start to degen 5% Max HP

If a sacrifice dies, they will reset the timer
If all circles are occupied by players, the Dome will be 2x faster
Duke will swipe 3 times toward a random player
Each swipe pushes players away and deals 10000 Magic Damage
If the player is impaled, will be instantly killed

Spikes impale heroes, which disables movement and spell casting until freed
Leap will instantly kill impaled players

At the end of the spell, a large pattern of spikes will appear at the end
Spikes impale heroes, which disables movement and spell casting until freed
Leap will instantly kill impaled players

Spikes impale heroes, which disables movement and spell casting until freed

When entering his Empowered Phase, he will gain a shield that will block 100% Damage
